oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Validation of the Minnesota Easy Culture System II: Results from In-lab Tri-plate Culture versus Standard Laboratory Culture, and Tri-plate Inter-reader Agreement
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jones, M.
Hochhalter, J.
Lago, A.
Godden, S.
Bey, R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Minnesota Easy Culture System II
mastitis
diagnosis
laboratory culture methods
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objectives of this study were to perform an in-lab validation of the Minnesota Easy Culture System II tri-plate method as compared to standardized laboratory culture methods and to describe inter-reader agreement for tri-plate culture results.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2006; 299-300
